page.title: 11Shopping
page.content: The shopping Facilities in the area covered by the map are vaired and offer an excelant choice for all ages and sexes. Mexborough is possibly the largest and has the greater facilities of the four areas and offers three supermarkets, several shoe shops and clothes shops, a wide variety of grocerey and bakery shops. The majority of people can what they want here, and if not Doncaster, Rotherham or Sheffield are not too far away. Wath offers several specialist shops for brewers and heath addicts, so for anything you could want you will never have to travel far afield.
